tweet.html: RT @FSIatState: Proud to recognize the contributions of U.S. diplomats during World War I. Amb Gerard and his staff facilitated American Red Cross hospital units’ arrival to treat soldiers behind German lines. Learn more about these #WWI #HeroesofUSDiplomacy here: go.usa.gov/xp3FN. pic.twitter.com/zg3sYLjqMV
